text: WCOS may refer to: * WCOS (AM), a radio station (1400 AM) licensed to Columbia, South Carolina, United States * WCOS-FM, a radio station (97.5 FM) licensed to Columbia, South Carolina, United States * WOLO-TV, a television station (channel 25 analog/8 digital) licensed to Columbia, South Carolina, United States, which formerly used the call sign WCOS-TV
title: WCOS
